summary: Jamiroquai is an English band from London known for their acid jazz and funk music. Led by singer Jay Kay, they started in 1992 and gained popularity in the 1990s. Their music combines acid jazz with other genres like rock and disco. The band has sold over 26 million albums worldwide. Their album "Travelling Without Moving" is the best-selling funk album ever, and their song "Virtual Insanity" won a Grammy and an MTV Video Music Award.
title: Jamiroquai
